Sentencas: The aim of this work is to assess the feasibility of a Biomass Integrated Gasifier Fuel Cell (B-IGFC) plant.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: High temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) are the most efficient energy systems currently being developed and they show good fuel flexibility thanks to their high operational temperature.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For the application here discussed, the fuel major active species are H-2, CO and CH4; yet, in wood-derived syngas small amounts of higher hydrocarbons are produced too.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Among them, tars are claimed to be biomass Achilles heel, causing severe issues in internal combustion engines and turbines.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Conversely, SOFCs might be able to decompose tars with a gain on cell performance.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, in order to avoid fast degradation, tars concentrations have to be below a critical threshold.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work, SOFC operation with real wood syngas from a pilot batch gasifier is firstly demonstrated.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Then, longer tests are repeated under controlled conditions, artificially reproducing wood syngas with and without tars.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Tests demonstrated that commercial NiYSZ-anode cells are able to work on syngas with a model tar (toluene) concentration up to 10 g/N m(3), exhibiting a voltage gain with regard to performances on syngas without model tar.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: No material degradation was observed after the experiments.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As a final result, this paper aims at providing a proof of concept of a simplified B-IGFC system design, in order to reach its cost-effectiveness on small-scale installations.
Titulo: Biomass integrated gasifier-fuel cells: Experimental investigation on wood syngas tars impact on NiYSZ-anode Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
